head: Divorce Notice.
ab: TERRITORY OF WASHINGTON, Second Judicial District, County of Thurston.
Catherin Vail, vs. Charles C. Vail.
p: YOU ARE HEREBY NOTIFIED that Catherine Vail has filed her Complaint against you in the U.S. District Court, within and for the Second Judicial District of Washington Territory, holding terms at Olympia, in siad Territory, which will come on to be heard before the Hon. C. C. Hewitt, Chief Justice of Washington Territory, and Judge of said 2d Judicial District, at Chambers, on the first Monday of December, 1865, at 11 o'clock A.M., the same being the 4th day of said month, and unless you appear as above notified, and answer, the same will be taken as confessed, and the decree and releif therein prayed for will be granted.
The object and Prayer of the said Complaint is to obtain a Decree of Divorce on the ground of abandonment for one year, and for cruel and brutal treatment and gross intemperence.
Complaint filed Sept. 16, 1865. Date of duplicate Sept. 16, 1865.
O. B. McFADDEN. Att'y for Plaintiff.
